description.displayText: I recommend Jennifer very highly.  She took care of my father-in-law who had dementia, until he passed.  She was compassionate, understanding, flexible, knowledgeable, resourceful, and dependable.  She would come to our home as early in the morning as we needed her to so we could go to work with a clear mind, knowing my father-in-law was in caring and capable hands.  Jennifer quickly became a part of our family and even our anxious skittish dog fell in love with her.  She taught us a lot about taking care of my father-in-law and was by our side when he passed.  At a very difficult time, she was a rock, someone we could always count on.  We are very grateful to have had her in our life and miss her.  You will not regret hiring her.

description.displayText: Jennifer has spent two years working as a in home caregiver for my grandfather. Our family couldn't have been more happier with her work ethics. My grandfather and family was quite fond of Jennifer. unfortunately we weren't in need of the services any more. Jennifer has a pleasant demeanor that was balanced by her sense of dedication to her job. She is an extremely knowledgeable caregiver who was able to offer my grandfather the very best care until the end. Jennifer has not left my grandfathers side until I arrived home. I felt very safe entrusting our love one to Jennifer's professional care. I would recommend her to any family, she is hard working , determined, dependable and goes beyond her job duties, I  believe that she will give any family her commitment and skills.

description.displayText: Jennifer is a really caring and nice people person. She goes above and beyond for all those she cares for.

description.displayText: Jennifer has many years of experience and will take great care of your loved ones.
description.originalText: Jennifer has many years of experience and will take great care of your loved ones.

description.displayText: Jennifer not only took care of my ailing grandmother for 3 years...she was a ray of sunlight and a friend to her in those years ...Thanks to Jennifer we had my grandmother around 2 years more than what the doctors told us to anticipate......Would definitely recommend her with high praises to anyone.
